title: Who Did It with a C*ck like This?! A Strange Tale of Unintentionally NTRing a Harem of True Love - Novel Updates

description:
The enchantingly beautiful home tutor, Rena Kurobuchi.

The protagonist who had received two years of sexual abuse from her, Seiya Kirishima.

The outcome, what he got was sexual techniques and a penis that has overdeveloped to an unnecessary degree.

 “Sex is unproductive. All I wanted was to experience pure love…”

Although he who was hurt lamented so, any woman who has tasted him once cannot help but go crazy.

A mysterious tale of him unintentionally stealing girls into his “true-love” harem

This is a story of love and lust.>
